title: The Inheritance of Loss - mood and setting

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Desai uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complex mood and setting.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Desai uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complex mood and setting.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the function of setting in a narrative.
